pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This video presents a tranquil, static shot of a garden path in a tropical location. The view is from a paved patio, looking out onto a walkway made of rectangular grey stone slabs set in fine white sand. The path is surrounded by lush green vegetation and a large, gnarled tree, creating a secluded and peaceful atmosphere.
